description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this Request for Standing Offer
duration_in_months: Bidding deadline not specified, but SSH Tender Server default applies (12 months)
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Wood and Construction Materials

### Contract Information

* **Contract Reference Number**: WS4422560716-Doc4606061493
* **Publication Date**: May 28, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 19, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: To be determined
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bidders to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the provision of wood and various construction materials for federal departments and organizations located in Montreal Metropolitan Community and Quebec Metropolitan Community.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Bidders are subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and other relevant agreements.

### Regions and Contracting Information

* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

### Bidding Information

For more information, please visit the following URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19839954?extsite=MTk4Mzk5NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19839954?extsite=MTk4Mzk5NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Contact: Corine Lavoie (she/her), corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
